channel.title: Projects on Wenlong Liu's website
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Wenlong Liu's website

item.title: High frequency measurements in a drained agricultural field
item.description: In order to further investigate the water movement and nutrient transport from agricultural fields, we developed equipment and algorithms to zoom in the hydrograph and chemograph both spatially and temporally. We installed self-designed high frequency sampling equipment to measure water quality from subsurface tile drainage outlet and from shallow groundwater. At the drainage tile outlet, we installed V-notch weir and pressure transducers to measure drainage flow, and an optical spetrophometer to continuously monitor nitrate concentration.
